|Build Status|

python-expirecache
==================

A process-safe python adapter to handle cache expiration.

Install
-------

.. code:: sh

    $ pip install expirecache

Usage
-----

.. code:: js

    from expirecache import Cache

    cache = Cache();

License
-------

MIT
